src_original: Vin_2.1407 / mūlānāñ ca /  Vin_2.1408 / svayaṃ ca pātanotpādyate sāhyatvaṃ ca /
Vin_2.1410 / na karake pānīyaṃ pibet saṃbhave hastanirmādanapatrayoḥ /
Vin_2.1414 / kāṣṭhamayaṃ śailamayam mṛnmayam iti /  Vin_2.1415 / dhārayet karakasthālakam /  Vin_2.1416 / kāṣṭhamayaṃ śailamayam vā /
Vin_1.173 / evaṃ nakhachedanaṃ /  Vin_1.174 / nānadhiṣṭhitā bhikṣuṇyaiṣā puruṣeṇāvītarāgā keśāṃ chedayet /
Vin_1.175 / saṃrajyamānām adhiṣṭhātrī samanuśiṣyān* [3b5] smṛtim upasthāpaya kim asmin* pūtikaḍevare sāram astīti /
Vin_1.176 / matṛsaṃjñāṃ bhaginyā duhitur veti kalpakaṃ /
Vin_1.177 / snānaṃ kṛte tra kurvīta /  Vin_1.178 / pañcāṅgikam vā śaucaṃ na nagnaḥ snāyāt* /
Vin_1.179 / na bhikṣuṇī puruṣatīrthe na strītīrthe cūrṇena /
Vin_1.183 / na bhikṣuṇī yoṣiti cūrṇaṃ kṣipet* /
Vin_2.1411 / asambhave cāpratigrastam* /  Vin_2.1412 / nāsya sajalatāyām api tattvaṃ* bhajet* /
